repositoryCreatedBy.title: Created by user identifier
repositoryCreatedBy.description: User ID of who created the record.

repositoryLastModifiedBy.title: Modified by user identifier
repositoryLastModifiedBy.description: User ID of who last modified the record. At creation time, `modifiedByUser` is set as `createdByUser`.

createdByBatchID.title: Created by batch identifier
createdByBatchID.description: The dataset files in Catalog which has been originating the creation of the record.

modifiedByBatchID.title: Modified by batch identifier
modifiedByBatchID.description: The last dataset files in Catalog which has modified the record. At creation time, `modifiedByBatchID` is set as `createdByBatchID`.

createDate.description: The server date and time when the resource was created in the repository, such as when an asset file is first uploaded or a directory is created by the server as the parent of a new asset. The date time property should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

modifyDate.description: The server date and time when the resource was last modified in the repository, such as when a new version of an asset is uploaded or a directory's child resource is added or removed. The date time property should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: A unique identifier for the record.

val.title: Choice Value
val.description: The value specified by the user as their preference or the basis of processing that precludes the need for user consent

val.description: The value specified by the user as their preference or the basis of processing that precludes the need for user consent

preferred.title: Preferred Channel
preferred.description: User's preferred channel for receiving communications

val.description: The value specified by the user as their preference or the basis of processing that precludes the need for user consent

time.title: Preference timestamp
time.description: Date and time this specific preference was collected. This value should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
subscriptions.description: A set of notifications, newsletters, etc. to which the user subscribes

mapObj.title: Subscription
mapObj.description: The name or identifier of the specific subscription

val.title: Choice Value
val.description: The value specified by the user as their preference or the basis of processing that precludes the need for user consent

subscribers.title: Subscribers
subscribers.description: The set of identifiers (email addresses, phone numbers, etc.) for this user who have subscribed

mapObj.title: Subscriber
mapObj.description: The specific identifier (email addresses, phone numbers, etc.) for this subscriber

time.title: Preference timestamp
time.description: Date and time this specific preference was collected. This value should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

source.title: Preference Source
source.description: Through which interface did the user provide this preference value

dataCap.title: Data Cap
dataCap.description: Captures the data cap limit for the account, in megabytes (MB).

connectionType.title: Connection Type
connectionType.description: Tracks the type of connection type for the subscription.

downloadSpeed.title: Download Speed
downloadSpeed.description: Records the maximum download speed available for the subscription, in megabytes (MB).

uploadSpeed.title: Upload Speed
uploadSpeed.description: Records the maximum upload speed available for the subscription, in megabytes (MB).

selfSetup.title: Self-Setup
selfSetup.description: Flags if a customer is eligible for internet setup without a technican visit.

responsiblePartyID.title: Responsible Party ID
responsiblePartyID.description: Identifier for the person responsible for the subscription, which typically could be their device phone number.

subscriptionType.title: Subscription Type
subscriptionType.description: Indicates the type of telecom subscription in which the customer is enrolled.

bundleName.title: Bundle Name
bundleName.description: Captures the name of any type of subscription bundle in which the customer is enrolled, such as 'Internet + TV'.

subscriptionDetails.title: Subscription Details
subscriptionDetails.description: Extension of the subscription data type to include subscription length, fees, status, etc.

activationDate.title: Activation Date
activationDate.description: Tracks the date in which the telecom subscription was activated.

deactivationDate.title: Deactivation Date
deactivationDate.description: Tracks the date in which the telecom subscription was deactivated.

equipmentFees.title: Equipment Fees
equipmentFees.description: Captures any equipment fees for items such as routers, modems, recievers, etc.

equipmentInsurance.title: Equipment Insurance
equipmentInsurance.description: Tracks if a customer has opted-in to equipment insurance for the subscription.

minutes.title: Minutes
minutes.description: Number of monthly minutes available within the subscription.

voicemail.title: Voicemail
voicemail.description: Flags if the landline subscription features include Voicemail.

callForwarding.title: Call Forwarding
callForwarding.description: Flags if the landline subscription features include Call Forwarding.

callerID.title: Caller ID
callerID.description: Flags if the landline subscription features include Caller ID.

callBlocking.title: Call Blocking
callBlocking.description: Flags if the landline subscription features include Call Blocking.

callWaiting.title: Call Waiting
callWaiting.description: Flags if the landline subscription features include Call Waiting.

threeWayCalling.title: Three-Way Dialing
threeWayCalling.description: Flags if the landline subscription features include Three-Way Dialing.

internationalCalling.title: International Calling
internationalCalling.description: Flags if the landline subscription features include International Calling.

unlimitedLocalCalling.title: Unlimited Local Calling
unlimitedLocalCalling.description: Flags if the landline subscription features include Unlimited Local Calling.

unlimitedDomesticLongDistance.title: Unlimited Domestic Long Distance
unlimitedDomesticLongDistance.description: Flags if the landline subscription features include Unlimited Domestic Long Distance.

channels.title: Channels
channels.description: Records the number of channels included with the media subscription.

streamingServices.title: Streaming Services
streamingServices.description: Array of all streaming services included with the subscription.

devices.title: Devices
devices.description: Array of line details and their associated devices.

accessories.title: Accessories
accessories.description: Array of accessories associated with the plan.

person.title: Person
person.description: An individual actor, contact, or owner.

userAccount.description: Loyalty details, preferences, login processes, and other account preferences.

contactDetails.title: Contact Details
contactDetails.description: Extension of the Personal Profile data type.

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: Date when the account was opened.

status.title: Status
status.description: This should describe the current status of the account

accountType.title: Account Type
accountType.description: Captures the user account type, if applicable.

productPreferences.title: Product Preferences
productPreferences.description: Product, shopping, or experience preferences such as gender, color pref, seat/aisle, king/double bed, etc.

alertStatus.title: Alert Status
alertStatus.description: Captures whether or not alerts have been enabled for the account.

autopayStatus.title: Autopay Status
autopayStatus.description: Captures whether or not the account has been enrolled in autopay.
